## **Short Bio**
<img src="images/IMG_8623.jpg" style="width:17%; border:3px solid ; margin-right: 10px; margin-top: -50px" align="right">


Hi! I’m Xin Zhang.   

I received my Ph.D. degree from the Dept. of Statistics at [Iowa State University](https://www.iastate.edu).   

Before that, I obtained my B.S in Mathematics from [Fudan University](http://www.fudan.edu.cn), Shanghai, China.
